I have been an AVID PUBG player, Yet i keep coming back to this game. I cannot imagine ONLINE gaming without CSGO. The only disappointment is that i didn't know this game existed! Only in 2017 i found out about CSGO. Awesome game as always.

非常喜欢的FPS射击游戏，玩这款游戏，你需要学习很多东西，和玩家一起teamwork。and  时刻警惕着。还有好多游戏设置。  一些新玩家不懂调节音量。听不见脚步声，。  或者经常跑动。暴露自己。等等。好多玩家  说对面开挂。 就因为打不过。  我说真的 。是你自己太菜了 。  我爱CS。  我爱CS GO !!!

Is this some kind of limbo? I've been stuck in the same battles since the year of our lord 2015. Sometimes changing sides but always with the same results. We die and return only to die again. Someone hear my plea, release me from this eternal torment of bloodlust. I'm tired of watching my comrades die, and hearing the children soldiers threaten to violate my mother. I want this torment to end and feel the embrace of paradise.

10/10 will play again.
